name: pricepulse
description: PricePulse - A comprehensive full-stack web application for tracking and comparing product prices across multiple online sources

scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run env:setup && npm run db:setup
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:start && sleep 5 && npm run db:push && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:setup:prod: npm run db:start && sleep 5 && npm run db:push && npm run db:setup:prod:sources
scripts.env:dev: cd backend && sed -i '' 's/NODE_ENV=production/NODE_ENV=development/' .env && echo '✅ Switched to development mode'
scripts.env:prod: cd backend && sed -i '' 's/NODE_ENV=development/NODE_ENV=production/' .env && echo '✅ Switched to production mode'
scripts.env:status: cd backend && echo 'Current environment:' && grep NODE_ENV .env
scripts.env:help: echo 'Environment commands: npm run env:setup, npm run env:dev, npm run env:prod, npm run env:status'
scripts.help: echo '📚 PricePulse NPM Scripts Reference' && echo '=====================================' && echo '🚀 Quick Start: npm run setup' && echo '🖥️  Development: npm run dev' && echo '🏗️  Building: npm run build' && echo '🧪 Testing: npm run test' && echo '🗄️  Database: npm run db:start, npm run db:setup' && echo '🌍 Environment: npm run env:dev, npm run env:prod' && echo '🚀 Deployment: npm run deploy' && echo '' && echo '📖 Full reference: See SCRIPTS_REFERENCE.md'
scripts.scripts: echo '📚 Available NPM Scripts:' && echo '=====================================' && echo '🔧 PROJECT SETUP:' && echo '  setup, install:all' && echo '' && echo '🖥️  DEVELOPMENT:' && echo '  dev, dev:frontend, dev:backend, dev:docker' && echo '' && echo '🏗️  BUILDING:' && echo '  build, build:frontend, build:backend, build:prod' && echo '' && echo '🧪 TESTING:' && echo '  test, test:frontend, test:backend, test:watch, test:coverage' && echo '' && echo '🗄️  DATABASE:' && echo '  db:start, db:stop, db:setup, db:setup:prod, db:reset' && echo '' && echo '🌍 ENVIRONMENT:' && echo '  env:setup, env:dev, env:prod, env:status' && echo '' && echo '🚀 DEPLOYMENT:' && echo '  deploy' && echo '' && echo '💡 Use: npm run help for quick reference'
